page.title: 18Population,Wishford area.
page.content: The last census in the area was held in 1981 and the population was recorded as Stapleford 260, and Great Wishford 328 people. The population of Little Langford is recorded as part of the population of The Langfords and together the total is 526 people. In all the villages in the area there is a common trend, the majority of people tend to be of the older generation. The younger people move to the towns to find jobs, while retired people move into the quiet of the villages. In particular long serving officers on retirement from military garrisons in nearby areas have chosen to settle in Stapleford. This pattern is repeated in Wishford, though the military element is less. The younger population is largely housed in council housing estates.
